Position Summary:


About the Company:

Nutrition for Longevity is a mission driven company, focusing on reimbursed Home Delivery Meals along with meals designed to support general healthy eating. N4L works with the largest insurance providers in the nation to provide our meals to eligible Medicaid and Medicare patients. Customer Service Representatives work with our customers helping them with meal orders, questions and coordinating with their care managers.


This role ensures the client's profile has all necessary authorizations and information needed to set them up, take their first order and enter them in our systems.


Position Responsibilities may include, but not limited to:

  • Manage inbound and outbound customer service calls with our clients placing meal orders
  • Address questions, and provide exceptional customer service
  • Contact case managers via telephone when a special situation arises regarding one of their clients
  • Co-Manage the client’s onboarding Process
  • Manages client relationships through all aspects of the customer service process
  • Document conversations with client
  • Ensure all assigned clients are contacted regularly and have orders placed
  • Implement client’s onboarding Process
  • Manages client relationships through all aspects of the customer service process
  • Initial New Client Contact and Ongoing Communication
  • Work with speed and accuracy


Preferred Skills & Experience

  • 1-3 years of previous healthcare or nutrition-based call center experience a plus
  • Previous experience with client service systems
  • Working knowledge with Project Management software, Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, and Outlook)
  • Strong organizational, decision making, written and verbal communication and presentation skills to working level
  • Ability to work independently but also in teams
  • Knowledge of HIPAA policies and procedures
  • Bi-Lingual (Spanish) a plus
